Home.title: DnA Solutions
Home.description: We are a team of AI and data experts from CMC Corporation who are passionate about helping businesses leverage the power of AI and data to achieve their goals.

Blog.title: Insights & Resources
Blog.description: Explore expert perspectives on SAP, AI, and data solutions. Our team shares practical insights, industry trends, and strategic guidance to help you navigate digital transformation and unlock the full potential of your enterprise systems.

Showcase.title: Built with DnA Solutions
Showcase.description: Discover amazing products and websites built using DnA Solutions.

Submission.title: Submit Your Product
Submission.description: Built something awesome with this starter? Share your product with our community and get featured on our showcase.
Submission.successMessage: Thank you! Your submission has been received. We'll review it shortly.
Submission.errorMessage: Something went wrong. Please try again.

Solutions.title: Solutions
Solutions.description: Discover our suite of AI-powered products and enterprise data services designed to accelerate your digital transformation journey.

hero.headline: Transform Your Business
hero.subtitle: Discover our suite of AI-powered products and enterprise data services designed to accelerate your digital transformation journey.

aiProductsSection.title: Intelligent Automation Suite
aiProductsSection.subtitle: Enterprise-ready AI products designed to automate workflows, enhance productivity, and drive business outcomes.

prismaAI.title: Prisma AI
prismaAI.description: Transform how your team accesses and synthesizes information. Like NotebookLM, Prisma AI helps you extract insights from multiple documents through natural conversations.

multiDocQA.title: Multi-Document Q&A
multiDocQA.description: Ask questions across multiple documents and get answers with source citations.

knowledgeSynthesis.title: Knowledge Synthesis
knowledgeSynthesis.description: Automatically synthesize information from various sources into coherent insights.

lightningFast.title: Lightning Fast
lightningFast.description: Get instant answers powered by advanced RAG and vector search technology.

enterpriseSecurity.title: Enterprise Security
enterpriseSecurity.description: Your data stays secure with enterprise-grade encryption and access controls.

smartEmail.title: Smart Email
smartEmail.description: Never miss important emails again. Our AI automatically classifies, prioritizes, and routes emails so your team can focus on what matters most.

smartClassification.title: Smart Classification
smartClassification.description: Automatically categorize emails by topic, urgency, and department.

priorityDetection.title: Priority Detection
priorityDetection.description: AI identifies critical emails and surfaces them instantly to the right people.

autoRouting.title: Auto-Routing
autoRouting.description: Route emails to the right team or department based on content and context.

analyticsDashboard.title: Analytics Dashboard
analyticsDashboard.description: Track email volumes, response times, and team performance metrics.

smartInvoice.title: Smart Invoice
smartInvoice.description: Reduce invoice processing time by 80%. Automate extraction, validation, and approval workflows with seamless SAP integration.

ocrExtraction.title: OCR Extraction
ocrExtraction.description: Extract data from invoices with 99%+ accuracy using advanced OCR technology.

sapIntegration.title: SAP Integration
sapIntegration.description: Native integration with SAP for seamless data flow and real-time updates.

smartValidation.title: Smart Validation
smartValidation.description: Automatically validate invoice data against purchase orders and contracts.

approvalWorkflows.title: Approval Workflows
approvalWorkflows.description: Intelligent routing and approval workflows that adapt to your business rules.

dataServicesSection.title: Enterprise Data Solutions
dataServicesSection.subtitle: Build a solid data foundation with our comprehensive data services. From governance to integration, we help you unlock the full potential of your data assets.

dataGovernance.title: Data Governance
dataGovernance.description: Establish robust data governance frameworks with policies, standards, and controls to ensure data quality, security, and compliance across your organization.

dataLakehouse.title: Data Lakehouse
dataLakehouse.description: Modern data architecture combining the flexibility of data lakes with the reliability of data warehouses for unified analytics and AI workloads.

dataIntegration.title: Data Integration
dataIntegration.description: Seamless data integration services connecting disparate systems, enabling real-time data flows, and ensuring data consistency across your enterprise.

Navbar.allSolutionsDescription: Explore our complete suite of AI products and data services.
Navbar.aiProductsDescription: Intelligent automation for project management, invoicing, HR, and email classification.
Navbar.dataServicesDescription: Enterprise data governance, lakehouse, and integration services.
